quote: If you wanted pomp and circumstance, you dealt with the vampires. If you wanted ceremony, the witches it was. But for plain old straight forward business, you dealt with the werewolves.
quote_letters: IF YOU WANTED POMP AND CIRCUMSTANCE YOU DEALT WITH THE VAMPIRES IF YOU WANTED CEREMONY THE WITCHES IT WAS BUT FOR PLAIN OLD STRAIGHT FORWARD BUSINESS YOU DEALT WITH THE WEREWOLVES
